job_description:
Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) Lead

Position Summary

The GRC Lead will spearhead the strategic governance, risk management, and compliance agenda to enhance the organization's cybersecurity resilience and ensure regulatory adherence.

As a pivotal leader and collaborator, the GRC Lead will be responsible for the development, implementation, and ongoing enhancement of the GRC framework, ensuring its alignment with business objectives, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices. This role involves managing GRC operations, leading cross-functional teams, engaging with executive leadership, and guiding strategic risk decisions to protect organizational resilience.

Key Responsibilities

Strategic Governance & Leadership

  • Lead the design, execution, and maturation of the organization’s comprehensive GRC strategy, including policy governance, risk management frameworks, compliance programs, and continuous improvement initiatives.
  • Oversee the governance structure, encompassing policy lifecycle management, control frameworks, and compliance awareness programs.
  • Align GRC objectives with business goals and regulatory mandates through close collaboration with executive leadership and key stakeholders.
  • Provide leadership, mentoring, and development support to GRC analysts and related teams.

Risk Management & Compliance Oversight

  • Direct enterprise-wide risk identification, assessment, mitigation strategies, and control effectiveness reviews.
  • Supervise compliance operations, including audit management, regulatory assessments, and compliance reporting, to ensure adherence to global standards (ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, PCI-DSS, SOC2).
  • Champion the definition of risk appetite and monitor risk tolerance in alignment with organizational priorities.

Process Improvement & Tooling

  • Guide the selection, deployment, and optimization of GRC tools and platforms (e.g., RSA Archer, ServiceNow GRC) to support scalable risk and compliance management.
  • Drive automation efforts to improve risk intelligence, compliance tracking, and reporting accuracy.
  • Identify and implement best practices and process improvements to boost operational efficiency and risk visibility.

Collaboration & Communication

  • Act as the primary liaison for GRC matters across IT, Security, Legal, Compliance, and Business units.
  • Translate complex risk and compliance information into clear, actionable recommendations for executive leadership and technical teams.
  • Lead training, awareness programs, and communication efforts to foster a culture of governance and risk mindfulness.
  • Engage with external partners, auditors, and regulators for GRC-related assessments and benchmarking.

Required Qualifications

  • 7–8 years of progressive experience in Governance, Risk, and Compliance within cybersecurity or related fields.
  • Proven leadership experience in managing GRC programs, teams, and strategic initiatives.
  • Deep expertise in regulatory standards and frameworks (ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, PCI-DSS, SOC2).
  • Strong background with GRC platforms such as RSA Archer, ServiceNow GRC, or similar.
  • Experience managing audits, risk assessments, compliance initiatives, and regulatory interactions.
  • Excellent strategic thinking, interpersonal, and communication skills.
  • Relevant certifications such as CISA, CISM, CISSP, CRISC, or PMP are highly desirable.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience with GRC automation and integration within DevSecOps or cloud security contexts.
  • Familiarity with IT and security control frameworks (CIS Controls, MITRE ATT&CK).
  • Industry experience in regulated sectors like finance, healthcare, or government.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a data-driven mindset.

Professional Attributes

  • Strategic and visionary leader with the ability to influence at all levels.
  • Collaborative and team-oriented approach with proven mentoring skills.
  • Detail-oriented, quality-focused, and proactive in risk anticipation.
  • Passionate about continuous learning and adapting to emerging cybersecurity trends.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at merin.cb@arttechgroup.com
summary: Lead GRC strategy, risk management, and compliance for cybersecurity resilience. Drive framework implementation, oversee operations, and ensure regulatory adherence. Requires 7-8 years of experience.

job_description:
Senior HR Generalist

About Techversant

Techversant is a Global Technology Services and Solutions Company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 16 years. Techversant has been providing Technology services in the key areas of Digital Transformation, Understanding the Evolving Industrial Scenarios, Investment Priorities and Technology Disruption.

We offer expertise and consultation in multiple technology domains like – ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Blockchain, Business Intelligence etc.

What’s important to us:

Techversant is seeking an experienced HR Generalist to join our dynamic team. The HR Generalist will play a crucial role in supporting various HR functions, including payroll processing & management, performance management, employee relations, HR policies, and procedures, compensation management & HR operations activities for the location. The ideal candidate should have 3-6 years of HR experience, excellent interpersonal skills, and a strong understanding of HR best practices. This is a challenging and rewarding opportunity for someone looking to make a significant impact in a fast-paced environment.

Roles and Responsibilities

  1. Payroll Processing:
    • Ensure accurate and timely processing of payroll for employees, including reviewing timesheets, calculating overtime, deductions, and benefits.
    • Collaborate with finance and accounting departments to reconcile payroll discrepancies and resolve any issues.
    • Stay updated on payroll laws and regulations to ensure compliance and recommend process improvements.
  2. Performance Management:
    • Coordinate and assist in the performance management process, including goal-setting, performance evaluations, and feedback sessions.
    • Provide guidance to managers and employees on performance-related matters, including addressing performance concerns, developing performance improvement plans, and recognizing outstanding achievements.
    • Monitor and track performance metrics and provide reports to management for decision-making purposes.
  3. Employee Relations:
    • Serve as a point of contact for employee inquiries, concerns, and grievances, ensuring prompt and effective resolution.
    • Conduct investigations into employee complaints or misconduct allegations, maintaining confidentiality and adhering to legal requirements.
    • Provide guidance and support to managers in handling employee relations issues, including disciplinary actions, terminations, and workplace conflict resolution.
  4. HR Policies and Procedures:
    • Develop, implement, and communicate HR policies, procedures, and guidelines to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
    • Regularly review and update employee handbooks, HR manuals, and related documents.
    • Provide training and guidance to employees and managers on HR policies, procedures, and compliance requirements.
  5. Onboarding:
    • Conduct new employee orientations and ensure a smooth onboarding experience.
  6. HR Data Management and Reporting:
    • Maintain accurate and up-to-date employee records, including personal information, employment history, benefits enrollment, and performance evaluations.
    • Generate HR reports and metrics for management, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
    • Ensure data integrity and confidentiality, complying with data protection regulations.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • 3-8 years of progressive experience in HR roles, with a focus on payroll processing, performance management, and employee relations.
  • Strong knowledge of HR best practices, employment laws, and regulations.
  • Experience with payroll software and HRIS systems.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to handle sensitive and confidential information with integrity.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
  • HR certification (e.g., SHRM-CP, PHR) is a plus.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@techversantinfotech.com
summary: Seeking an experienced HR Generalist with 3-8 years of experience in payroll, performance management, and employee relations. This role supports various HR functions in a fast-paced environment.

job_description:

We are looking for a System Administrator with hands-on experience managing and maintaining IT infrastructure. The role requires strong expertise in Azure Active Directory, Windows Server, Azure, AWS cloud platforms and a variety of Microsoft technologies, including IIS Web Server, MS SQL Administration, and Microsoft 365 administration.

Responsibilities:

Windows & Server Administration - Install, configure, and manage Windows Server environments. - Manage Azure Active Directory (AD), Group Policies, DNS, and DHCP. - Perform regular system updates, patches, and backups.

Hosting & Application Support - Configure and maintain IIS hosting for web applications. - Manage Blazor application hosting and troubleshoot deployment issues. - Support and configure Apache servers for web hosting requirements.

Containerization & Virtualization - Deploy and manage applications using Docker containers. - Perform basic administration of VMware ESXi / vCenter for virtualized infrastructure.

Cloud Platforms - Manage and monitor AWS instances including EC2, S3, IAM, and networking. - Work with Azure VM, DevOps for CI/CD pipelines, source code management, and release automation.

Microsoft Ecosystem - Administer Office 365 services (Exchange Online, Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive). - Manage users, licenses, and policies across Microsoft Admin Centers (Entra ID / Azure AD, Security, Compliance, Endpoint Manager, Exchange, Teams).

Skills & Qualifications:

  • Proven experience as an IT/System Administrator or similar role.
  • Strong knowledge of Windows Server administration and Azure Active Directory.
  • Hands-on experience with IIS, Blazor hosting, Apache, Nginx.
  • Good understanding of Docker and containerized deployments.
  • Familiarity with AWS services and Azure DevOps pipelines.
  • Knowledge of VMware basics (ESXi/vCenter).
  • Proficiency in Office 365 administration and Microsoft Admin Centers.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@cyberionsoft.com.

Junior DevOps Engineer - Tech Support

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum, Kerala (Preferred candidate locations: Kerala, Tamil Nadu, and Karnataka) Address: SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai Closing Date: 25, Nov 2025 Job Published: 11, Oct 2025

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive & highly skilled Technical Support Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services like CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services

  • Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads.
  • Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and making decisions based on the analysis.
  • Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools

  • Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues.
  • Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health.
  • Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation.
  • Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security

  • Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues.
  • Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic.
  • Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic.
  • Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols.
  • Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications.
  • Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains

  • Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging.
  • Understanding of Kubernetes concepts for managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues, along with related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines.
  • Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management

  • Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging.
  • Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication

  • Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents.
  • Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers.
  • Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.

Additional Information

Salary Package: 4 - 6 LPA Work Type: Work From Office Location: Trivandrum Experience: 0.5 - 2 years
summary: Seeking a skilled Technical Support Engineer with 0.5-2 years of experience for overseas projects. Role involves troubleshooting cloud, networking, and DevOps issues in a rotational shift environment.

If you thrive in a target-driven environment and excel at turning prospects into long-term partners, this role is for you.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead Generation: Source, engage, and qualify prospective clients through calls, personalized emails, and digital outreach.
  • Sales Presentations: Craft and deliver persuasive proposals that highlight solutions and communicate clear value propositions.
  • CRM Management: Accurately update and manage prospect data, monitor pipeline progress, and ensure timely follow-ups within the CRM.
  • Target Achievement: Consistently achieve or exceed sales goals and KPIs to drive revenue growth.
  • Relationship Management: Build and nurture long-term client relationships to encourage loyalty, repeat business, and high-value referrals.
  • Reporting & Analysis: Generate detailed sales reports and provide actionable insights to enhance productivity.

Preferred Skills

  • Proven experience in B2B sales with a track record of consistently meeting or exceeding targets.
  • 3–5 years of sales experience; prior exposure to the e-commerce sector is a strong advantage.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Strong negotiation, persuasion, and relationship management capabilities.
  • Self-motivated, goal-driven, and able to work independently with minimal supervision.
  • Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., Zoho) and Microsoft Office Suite.
  • Resilient and positive mindset with the ability to handle rejection and bounce back quickly.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.

Why you will love working with us

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super App in the US.
  • Make a meaningful impact across a growing base of 10+ million users.
  • Join a dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.
summary: Seeking a Business Development Executive with 3-5 years of experience to drive market growth. Responsibilities include lead generation, client relationship building, and achieving sales targets for America's leading auto super app.

job_description:
Senior QA Automation Engineer

Company: Way Dot Com (P) Ltd Location: Thiruvananthapuram, India Contact Email: careers@way.com Apply Now: https://waydot.greythr.com/hire/jobs/senior-qa-engineer

About Us

Way.com is America’s dominant automotive super app, serving over 10 million customers with services including auto insurance, parking, and EV charging. We utilize cutting-edge AI, machine learning, and data analytics to provide innovative, personalized solutions for car ownership. Recognized by Bloomberg, ranked on Andreessen Horowitz’s Marketplace list, and awarded top Product in Insurance by UnitQ, Way.com is simplifying car ownership.

Job Details

  • Job Title: Senior QA Automation Engineer
  • Experience Required: 5–8 years
  • Work Arrangement: On-site
  • Employment Type: Full-time
  • Job Published: October 10, 2025
  • Closing Date: October 12, 2025

Role Overview

We are looking for an experienced Senior QA Automation Engineer with strong expertise in Java-based test automation. This role involves designing and maintaining scalable automation frameworks, developing robust testing strategies, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate quality into the entire software development lifecycle.

Key Responsibilities

  • Test Strategy & Design: Develop detailed test strategies and plans from complex business requirements, ensuring comprehensive test coverage.
  • Automation Frameworks: Design, build, and enhance scalable automation frameworks using Core Java and modern testing tools.
  • Collaboration & Quality Ownership: Partner with developers, product managers, and QA teams to embed quality throughout the SDLC.
  • Functional & E2E Testing: Conduct thorough functional and end-to-end testing to verify accuracy, performance, and user experience.
  • Automation Execution: Create and execute automated test scripts for web and API testing using Selenium WebDriver, Rest Assured, and related technologies.
  • CI/CD Enablement: Integrate test automation into CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins) to support continuous testing and faster releases.
  • Issue Resolution: Monitor, troubleshoot, and resolve automation failures to ensure test suite reliability.
  • Documentation & Standards: Develop and maintain reusable test cases, structured scripts, and clear documentation for scalability.
  • Defect Tracking: Log, track, and collaborate with engineering teams to ensure timely defect resolution and quality delivery.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience: 5+ years in test automation using Java.
  • Core Java: Strong knowledge of object-oriented principles, exception handling, multi-threading, and file handling.
  • Java Collections: Proficiency with Lists, Sets, Maps, Queues, and a solid understanding of data structures and algorithms.
  • Selenium WebDriver: Hands-on experience with dynamic element handling, custom waits, and cross-browser testing.
  • REST API Testing: Proficiency with Rest Assured for request modeling, authentication, and API validation.
  • CI/CD: Experience with Jenkins or similar tools for pipeline integration and maintenance.
  • Performance Testing: Familiarity with tools like JMeter, K6, or Locust, and the ability to identify performance bottlenecks.
  • Soft Skills: Strong attention to detail, problem-solving abilities, and the capacity to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

Why Work With Us?

  • Work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Make a significant impact on over 10 million users.
  • Experience a dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven culture.
  • Benefit from clear career growth pathways in a rapidly scaling tech company.
  • Receive competitive compensation.
summary: Seeking a Senior QA Automation Engineer with 5-8 years of Java automation experience. Design scalable frameworks, develop testing strategies, and collaborate to ensure quality across the SDLC.

About Us

Founded over a decade ago, Lean Transition Solutions Ltd (LTS) is a UK-headquartered, ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 software and Leadership 4.0 solutions globally to world-class organizations, including Fortune 500 companies, with offices in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico.

  • Assist in Software Development: Work closely with developers to design, develop, test, and maintain web and mobile applications.

job_description:
UI/UX & Product Designer - Experienced

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai Job Published: 10, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 24, Nov 2025

Brief Description

We are looking for a talented Product & UI/UX Designer who can transform our software into intuitive, user-friendly products that delight our clients.

Role Overview

As a Product & UI/UX Designer, you will own the end-to-end design process, from understanding user needs to crafting visually appealing interfaces and ensuring a seamless user experience. You will collaborate with product managers, engineers, and stakeholders to balance innovation with practical, effective solutions.

Responsibilities

  • Conduct user research, interviews, and competitor analysis in collaboration with product managers and engineers.
  • Translate insights into wireframes, storyboards, user flows, sitemaps, and prototypes.
  • Design and develop graphic user interface elements, including menus, tabs, widgets, and interactive components.
  • Build UI mock-ups and prototypes to clearly illustrate product functionality and look.
  • Create original graphic designs and present drafts to internal teams and stakeholders.
  • Identify and troubleshoot UX issues, making adjustments based on user feedback and usability testing.
  • Ensure products are usable, accessible, and enjoyable for end users.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align design with product strategy and goals.
  • Maintain design consistency and adhere to brand guidelines across all digital products.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor’s/Master’s/Diploma in Design or related field preferred.
  • Strong portfolio of design projects.
  • Proficiency in Photoshop and wire framing/prototyping tools (Figma, Sketch, etc.).
  • Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap is a plus.
  • Good understanding of colour, typography, layout, and interactive design.
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills.

Experience Required

  • 2 plus years.

Work Type: Work From Office Location: Trivandrum Salary Package: 5-7 LPA
summary: Seeking a Product & UI/UX Designer for end-to-end design. Responsibilities include user research, prototyping, and interface design. Requires strong portfolio and tool proficiency.
